text: Futhi waphakamisela abazali bakhe esihlalweni sobukhosi bawa bamkhothamela wayesethi (uJosefa) “Oh Baba wami! lena incazelo yephupho lami langaphambilini iNkosi yami ilenze lafezeka futhi yaba nomusa ngenkathi ingikhipha ejele futhi yaniletha (lapha) nisuka empilweni yasebhadawi (yasogwadule) emva kokuba usathane esetshale ukungezwani phakathikwaminabafowethungempelaiNkosiyamiinobubele kulokho ekuthandayo ngempela yona iyazi inobuhlakani”
